amendment.description: Amendment to require that nothing in the bill impact the supply of domestically-produced energy resources.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-758 to require that nothing in the bill impact the supply of domestically-produced energy resources.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boyda (KS) amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 421 - 0 (Roll no. 505).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
